name: Sarah's Homemade Applesauce
briefdescription: This applesauce recipe is easy to make from scratch with apples, sugar, and cinnamon for a delicious topping on pancakes, ice cream, or pork chops.
instructions: Combine apples, water, sugar, and cinnamon in a saucepan; cover and cook over medium heat until apples are soft, about 15 to 20 minutes.
Allow apple mixture to cool, then mash with a fork or potato masher until it is the consistency you like.

comments.comment: Love it and simple process. Thank you. I will rate this for 5 stars!
